channel.title: Source Problem! Help Please
channel.description:
Okay i have a few problems,
Problem #1: If I open up Utorrent, I can't connect & neither can players, but according to [url=http://www.canyouseeme.org/]http://www.canyouseeme.org/[/url] , They can connect, "Success: I can see your service on 98.113.29.64 on port (43594), Your ISP is not blocking port 43594" But still players can't connect and neither can I.. , if I turn off utorrent, I can connect, but players can't. Oh and yes, i use a different client, my client ip is 127.0.0.1, other player's clients are my no-ip
Problem #2: My source says 127.0.0.1:43594, When in "server.java" i changed it to my no-ip (example: yourserver.no-ip.biz), and i compiled, but it still pops up as 127.0.0.1:43594, this is a PI Source,
any ideas on why any of these don't work? Thankyou for your time.

item.title: Source Problem! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @darkageisme darkageisme
item.description:
@darkageisme wrote:

I use no-ip.com to host never use utorrent then everyone will need to download it and they wont want to.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Problem! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

you might want to try another source then.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Problem! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @snortydaisy snortydaisy
item.description:
@snortydaisy wrote:

[quote=“infallibl3, post:2, topic:446168”]I don’t know if you’ve checked or not, but I made the mistake of not turning my no-ip on. you also don’t have to change the ip of the source for the client to connect to it, so don’t worry about server.java.

The problem might be a type-o in your client, or perhaps you didn’t change the no-ip in enough locations (theres 2 in client.java)

the locations you must change the no-ip at in your client are:
both in client.java
line 13646: server = "0.0.0.0";
and
line 14272: public static String server = "0.0.0.0";[/quote]

Didn’t work… :S I think it’s the source honestly.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Problem! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

I don’t know if you’ve checked or not, but I made the mistake of not turning my no-ip on. you also don’t have to change the ip of the source for the client to connect to it, so don’t worry about server.java.

The problem might be a type-o in your client, or perhaps you didn’t change the no-ip in enough locations (theres 2 in client.java)

the locations you must change the no-ip at in your client are:
both in client.java
line 13646: server = "0.0.0.0";
and
line 14272: public static String server = "0.0.0.0";

Read full topic

Okay i have a few problems,

Problem #1: If I open up Utorrent, I can’t connect & neither can players, but according to http://www.canyouseeme.org/ , They can connect, “Success: I can see your service on 98.113.29.64 on port (43594), Your ISP is not blocking port 43594” But still players can’t connect and neither can I… , if I turn off utorrent, I can connect, but players can’t.
Oh and yes, i use a different client, my client ip is 127.0.0.1, other player’s clients are my no-ip

Problem #2: My source says 127.0.0.1:43594, When in “server.java” i changed it to my no-ip (example: yourserver.no-ip.biz), and i compiled, but it still pops up as 127.0.0.1:43594, this is a PI Source,

any ideas on why any of these don’t work? Thankyou for your time.
